name: Knife Throw Log Challenge
description:
The best Knife Throw Log Challenge is here!

Throw the knives into the logs to break them. Slash the apples and unlock new knives. Each 4th stage is defended by a boss - beat them if you can and become a wonder Knife master of the world!

Everyday you get new apples so that you can unlock new knifes.
Maybe you will collect all the knifes with your apples.

Be careful do not hit the knives or you will lose the game.
You're action and time is important, target carefully and become the knife master of the world!

You can select from 20 knifes in the game to throw on the logs. Every level will be harder and harder.

Do you think you can defeat the bosses? on Knife Throw Log Challenge?
That i think you will become the best Knife Throw player in the world.

Knife Throw Log Challenge is develop by WhoepzStudio

The logs will be circle around and you must hit the log with the knifes. When you smash it! You will win the game and you go to the next round.
